Work in Public Cloud environments such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure • Job Requirements Your skills and experience You have: • You have SharePoint Online and/or Designer website development experience • Experience working with the SharePoint App model (provider hosted and/or SharePoint hosted) Experience programming VBA in Office applications • Nice to have: • You have knowledge of ASP.NET / C# .NET / REST / MVC / CDN/ JSON • Knowledge of SharePoint Server Side and Client-Side Object Model • Knowledge of SharePoint Designer Workflows • Previous experience with Visual Studio and Microsoft Team Foundation Services Knowledge of public cloud environments such as Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure • Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 28, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
